name: Stuck!
description:
Stuck! is a game made for LudumDare 42 Compo in 48 hours.

Theme : Running Out of space

Reach the door before the next stop!

-Controls-

Move : Arrow Keys

Start : Return

Quit : Alt+F4

Edit: Dumb me forgot to run physics functions in Fixed Update, so it's "fixed" now. Please let me know if you are having any issues.
